description: Election Commission - Mr. K. M. N. Banda of the Walapane Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of member of that P/S - Mr. R. A. M. G. Nelson Karunathilaka of the Walapane P/S has vacated his office of member of that P/S - Mr. S. Karpar of the Walapane P/S has vacated his office of member
